name: Slash It!
description:
Hello guys. This is a DEMO version of my game that i am working on.

Trailer : 

There is a 8 levels randomly generated. Last level is boos fight.

I will recommend to play this game on fullscreen. Dunno why is top side cutted. :/

The game is rly Hard and took me (as developer) like 4th try to finish it :)

Books (recepies) is drop from bigger white guys (not 100% drop). 

Boos is rly hard but not unbeatable.

Guide is in the game :)

Hope you enjoy it :)

Credits: 

@neoriceisgood

@0x72

Thanks for awesome weapons and tile assets :)

Game created by EnchikO in Unity :)
